fr.xephi.authme.settings.commandconfig

Class CommandManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.settings.commandconfig.CommandManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reloadable

    public class CommandManager
extends Object
implements Reloadable
    Manages configurable commands to be run when various events occur.

    • Method Summary

      Performs the reload action.

      Runs the configured commands for when a player has successfully registered.

        player - the player that logged in
        otherAccounts - account names whose IP is the same as the player's
